name: Cayotea
description:
It was done in 1 week.

Collect teas and buy your special character. Attention! You have to cross the tough uncles in front of you, jump over them and collect the tea ...

Buttons for mobile devices are on the screen.

PC için Space tuşu ve mouse ile ekrandaki ileri butonuna tıklayarak çalışan özellikler mevcuttur.

Please do not miss your comments after playing ...
